EXPLORA

It's a Friday night. You and your friends are done for the week. You all want to go out for dinner, but the same question comes up every week.

Where to eat?

About

LA & NY-Based Startup

EXPLORATM was started from two dorms on opposite coasts. It aims to solve a fundamental issue that many college students face. Making decisions about WHERE to eat next. People have different tastes and different cravings at different times - we aim to provide a central platform where you and your friends can collate any and all your wants - whether you're in the mood for something spicy, Chinese, or salads even, and we will give you tell you the closest and best place that'll satisfy everyone.
